name: sap-document-information-extraction
description: Document Information Extraction helps you to process various documents that have content in headers and tables. You can use the extracted information, for example, to automatically process payables, invoices, or payment notes while making sure that invoices and payables match.

servicePlans.name: blocks_of_100
servicePlans.description: Base edition plan intended for productive usage. Process business documents using pretrained machine learning models and templates.

servicePlans.name: default
servicePlans.description: Plan for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 1000 documents.

servicePlans.name: free
servicePlans.description: Free plan intended for development and try-out purposes. Please note, only community support is available for free service plans, and these plans are not subject to SLAs. Use of free tier service plans is subject to additional terms and conditions as provided in the SAP Business Technology Platform Supplemental Terms and Conditions. (See SAP BTP Cockpit > Service Marketplace > Document Information Extraction tile > Additional Links)

servicePlans.name: premium_edition
servicePlans.description: Premium edition plan intended for productive usage. Process business documents using generative AI, pretrained machine learning models, and templates. This cloud service includes AI technologies or features therefore section 10 of the SAP Business Technology Platform Supplemental Terms and Conditions applies. (See SAP BTP Cockpit > Service Marketplace > Document Information Extraction tile > Additional Links)
